mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POPUP_TIMETABLE (pt_day_of_week, pop_id, pt_start_date_time, pt_end_date_time, pt_capacity) VALUES (#{ptDayOfWeek}, #{popId}, #{ptStartDateTime}, #{ptEndDateTime}, #{ptCapacity})
mapper.select: SELECT pop_id AS popId, pt_day_of_week AS ptDayOfWeek, pt_start_date_time AS ptStartDateTime, pt_end_date_time AS ptEndDateTime, pt_capacity AS ptCapacity, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM POPUP_TIMETABLE WHERE pop_id = #{popId} ORDER BY pt_day_of_week
